replies.body:
I'm almost certain you did not get a 2 week ban for AFKing. 2 week bans for AFKing only happen in extreme cases of intentional AFKing. 

You need to contact [Riot Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and ask why you were actually banned.

Also for next time you might want to do this
http://pad3.whstatic.com/images/thumb/5/5c/PushButton-Step-2.jpg/670px-PushButton-Step-2.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=cerebus,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=MK7TzVig,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-01-06T11:42:14.735+0000)
>
> 100 percent sure buddy

What Tele was trying to get to is that, unless AFK'ing is an established common activity within your profile, 1 or a couple sudden power outage or otherwise emergency AFK shouldn't have given you a ban unless there's an error (which is why they ask you to send in support ticket because afaik they could disclose why you are given the ban as long as it's not about cheating).

Exactly as SEKAI said. You would not be 14 day banned for a few dcs, you would get Leaver buster timers. To get banned for leaving games you have to be leaving an extraordinary number of ranked games. If all of those leaves were because of power outages then it's on you not to play ranked when you know your power is unreliable.

This is a multiplayer game, and every time you leave you are destroying the experience for 9 other players. Unreliable power may be a risk YOU are willing to take, but it is not one that you should be forcing others to, especially in ranked.
although for newer players leaver buster can appear to be a ban for the unobservant. It was really funny the first time my sister flipped out over leave buster after she rage quit a match.

I'm like 90% sure he mentioned somewhere in the OP that it was a 14 day ban. I remember reading it, and clearly Tele and SEKAI read the same so it seems perhaps that comment was removed. If it was because he was mistaken about the nature of Leaver Buster bans I can understand that.

It is possible to be 14 day banned for leaving ranked games though, so I'm not really sure what happened here.
